help-all: Listing all top-level commands and groups. Specify a command to see more information.
help-group-standalone: This group is a standalone command.
denied: This command works only in private #moderators channel.
configuring-changed-domain: Domain for translation of recent changes was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-lang: Language for the bot on this server was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-wiki: Wiki for links on this server was changed to **{0}**.
configuring-changed-reset: The value was reset back to default.
configuring-required-value:
The value for a parameter is required.
To get full help for the command, send `{0}`.
configuring-badvalue-domain:
Edit broadcasting is available only for Wikimedia projects.
List of allowed domains: {0}.
configuring-badvalue-lang: The bot doesn’t recognise your input as a valid ISO 639 code.
configuring-badvalue-wiki: There must be `{0}` at the end of your URL.
configuring-help-domain: Change the domain from which recent changes are broadcasted on this server. Works only for Wikimedia projects.
configuring-help-domain-value: domain of a Wikimedia project (in ru.wikipedia.org format). Use `-` to reset to default.
configuring-help-lang: Change the language of the bot on this server.
configuring-help-lang-value: the language of bot you want. Use `-` to reset to default.
configuring-help-wiki: Change the main wiki for links on this server. /wiki/$1 at the end is required.
configuring-help-wiki-value: the wiki you want (in <https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/$1> format). Use `-` to reset to default.
streaming-added: **[+]** Stream with a goal `{0}` was added for processing in the channel {1}.
streaming-removed: **[−]** Stream with a goal `{0}` was removed from processing in the channel {1}.
streaming-required-channel:
The channel name is a required parameter.
To get full help for the command, send `{0}`.
streaming-required-goal:
The stream goal is a required parameter.
To get full help for the command, send `{0}`.
streaming-help-open: Start broadcasting a part of the stream in the channel. Works only in #moderators.
streaming-help-close: Stop broadcasting a part of the stream in the channel. Works only in #moderators.
streaming-help-channel: the channel that is available to you in which the broadcast must be done.
streaming-help-goal: the page title (with \_ for spaces) or namespace number (in <>).
